      private static LightningOpMode Lightning.opmode
      The op mode to get joystick information from.
      Methods in io.github.thunderbots.lightning with parameters of type LightningOpMode

      static void Lightning.initialize(LightningOpMode opmode)

    • Uses of LightningOpMode in io.github.thunderbots.lightning.opmode

      Subclasses of LightningOpMode in io.github.thunderbots.lightning.opmode 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Autonomous
      A filler class that should act as a superclass for all autonomous op modes.
      class  CompoundOpMode
      Deprecated. 
      CompoundOpMode as a whole is untested and unconfirmed. It will likely work to some extent, but because of the high number of threads associated with using multiple op modes simultaneously, it will break down when trying to run too many simultaneous op modes.

      A CompoundOpMode is an op mode that includes the functionality of several different op modes.
      class  SimpleOpMode
      A SimpleOpMode is an op mode that is designed to make the op mode programming process very easy.
      class  TeleOp
      The TeleOp class is a base class that all tele-op programs should extend.
      Fields in io.github.thunderbots.lightning.opmode declared as LightningOpMode 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private LightningOpMode[] CompoundOpMode.opmodes
      Deprecated. 
      The list of op modes that this compound op mode combines the functionality of.
      Constructors in io.github.thunderbots.lightning.opmode with parameters of type LightningOpMode 
      Constructor and Description
      CompoundOpMode(LightningOpMode[] opmodes)
      Deprecated. 
      CompoundOpMode as a whole is untested and unconfirmed. It will likely work to some extent, but because of the high number of threads associated with using multiple op modes simultaneously, it will break down when trying to run too many simultaneous op modes.

      Constructs a new compound op mode with the given list of op modes.
